content.html: Elon: let me just flip this switchy thingy here it can't be anything but "bloat" Twitter: *all of two factor ID gets turned off unless you're using authenticator app* This is what has actually happened today. Log out with 2FA, you won't get back in. Wild.
content.value:
Elon: let me just flip this switchy thingy here it can't be anything but "bloat"

Twitter: *all of two factor ID gets turned off unless you're using authenticator app*

This is what has actually happened today. Log out with 2FA, you won't get back in. Wild.
